1.title: Media Ownership and the Digital Age
1.plot: Media and business experts discuss the implications of the digital age on media ownership and content delivery in Australia.

2.title: Digital Infrastructure and the Growth of Sydney's West
2.plot: Prominent Western Sydney identities discuss the future of Australia's fastest-growing region.

imdb.plot outline: Future Forum takes an insightful look at issues affecting modern Australian society in the digital age. From media ownership to the future growth of Sydney's burgeoning suburbs, Future Forum showcases business and community leaders share their experience and knowledge. Hosted by media buyer and philanthropist Harold Mitchell, AC, and 2012 Prime Minister's Australian University Teacher of the Year Professor James Arvanitakis, Future Forum encourages debate about important issues that affect everyone living in the Sydney region.
imdb.title: Future Forum
plot: A documentary of seven teenage boys from Western Sydney trekking the grueling Kokoda Trail alongside members of the Panthers NRL team, and their personal journeys of self-discovery.

_Future Forum_ (qv) takes an insightful look at issues affecting modern Australian society in the digital age. From media ownership to the future growth of Sydney's burgeoning suburbs, _Future Forum_ (qv) showcases business and community leaders share their experience and knowledge. Hosted by media buyer and philanthropist Harold Mitchell, AC, and 2012 Prime Minister's Australian University Teacher of the Year Professor James Arvanitakis, _Future Forum_ (qv) encourages debate about important issues that affect everyone living in the Sydney region.::Anonymous
